snippet: Environmental groups said that British Columbia, which has been concerned about spills, has probably doomed the pipeline.
abstract: British Columbia urges federal review panel to reject $6 billion plan for Enbridge Northern Gateway pipeline exporting oil sands bitumen to Asia-bound tankers, dealing severe blow to project; several concerns raised by British Columbia in its rejection echo those of American environmentalists regarding Keystone XL pipeline that would link oil sands with American refineries on Gulf Coast.
lead_paragraph: Environmental groups said that British Columbia, which has been concerned about spills, has probably doomed the pipeline.

headline.main: British Columbia Opposes Planned Oil Sands Pipeline
headline.print_headline: British Columbia Opposes Planned Oil Sands Pipeline
